snippet: Kim Han Sol, 16, the son of Kim Jong Il’s oldest son, has started attending classes at a private English-language high school in Mostar, Bosnia.
lead_paragraph: Kim Han Sol, 16, the son of Kim Jong Il’s oldest son, has started attending classes at a private English-language high school in Mostar, Bosnia.

headline.main: Korean Leader’s Grandson Attending School in Bosnia
headline.print_headline: Korean Leader’s Grandson Attending School in Bosnia
headline.seo: Kim Jong Il’s Grandson Attending School in Bosnia
